channel.title: Vampire redo [NPC]
channel.description:
Well here is my 3rd attempt at an npc, hate, rate or debate. what ever makes you happy. enjoi.
[img]http://sitebuilder.yola.com/sites/D735/D601/Dddf/D942/U8a4986c81f22b3b1011f249fdd106537/8a4986c8212ba8d001212cab7a530a7b/resources/Picture%2029.png[/img] first time i have made eye balls, and i fixed up the nose to make it look a little more realistic. added low poly ears. [img]http://sitebuilder.yola.com/sites/D735/D601/Dddf/D942/U8a4986c81f22b3b1011f249fdd106537/8a4986c8212ba8d001212cab7a530a7b/resources/Picture%2030.png[/img] natural body curves? [img]http://sitebuilder.yola.com/sites/D735/D601/Dddf/D942/U8a4986c81f22b3b1011f249fdd106537/8a4986c8212ba8d001212cab7a530a7b/resources/Picture%2031.png[/img] clay render. [img]http://sitebuilder.yola.com/sites/D735/D601/Dddf/D942/U8a4986c81f22b3b1011f249fdd106537/8a4986c8212ba8d001212cab7a530a7b/resources/Picture%2032.png[/img]

item.title: Vampire redo [NPC]
item.dc:creator: @0bbyme 0bbyme
item.description:
@0bbyme wrote:

well i don’t have a body modeled but the clothing is a different object, i wanted this to be low poly enough so i could eventually release for a client. But I suppose i could make a quick body without that much detail and have the clothing just fall on the body like you said.

Read full topic

item.title: Vampire redo [NPC]
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Oooh, are you starting from a skeleton biped?
Suppose this could be a lot more difficult due to it all being one model, would’ve been better to animate if you created just the bare naked body then added the clothes on top, or modelled them around it.
You could then turn these into cloth and make them as collision objects so when they collide with the legs or whatever’s moving beneath the clothes, they move with them and not just go through them.

Read full topic

item.title: Vampire redo [NPC]
item.dc:creator: @0bbyme 0bbyme
item.description:
@0bbyme wrote:

lol thanks, really thats what i was trying to do with this model, get the face correct, i have been trying to animate it but i just cant get the rigging right =\

Read full topic

item.title: Vampire redo [NPC]
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

This is amazing, facial modelling is very hard to get accurate and you’ve done a pretty damn good job of it, well done.

ps. take a tut on character rigging and animation and let’s see him walk.

Read full topic
